bibl.title: Upon the Identity and Competence of Phileas.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Aly, Zaki

bibl.note: Fragmentary letter to Zenon. Identification of Phileas (whose name occurs in l. 6) as the "eklogistes" of the Arsinoite nome. The official career of Phileas and his disgrace.
Aly Zaki, Upon the Identity and Competence of Phileas.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 71-76, 2 pll.
